title: Angelslayer
data:
| )   Angelslayer   *(No tile)*         |                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| ------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| Base item                             | [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident")                                                                                                                                                                                      |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| Damage vs. small                      | 1d6 + 1 **+1d10**                                                                                                                                                                                                       |
| Damage vs. large                      | 3d4 **+1d10**                                                                                                                                                                                                           |
| To-hit bonus                          | **+1d5**                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| Bonus versus                          | [Angelic beings](/wiki/Angelic_being "Angelic being") and non-[demons](/wiki/M2_DEMON "M2 DEMON")                                                                                                                       |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| Weapon skill                          | [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident")                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Size                                  | one-handed                                                                                                                                                                                                              |
| Affiliation                           | - [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned")
- [balrogs](/wiki/Balrog "Balrog")                                                                                                                                           |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| When carried                          | *(none)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
| When wielded                          | * [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage")
* [automatic searching](/wiki/Automatic_searching "Automatic searching")
* [warned of angels](/wiki/Warned_of_monster_type "Warned of monster type") |
| When [invoked](/wiki/Invoke "Invoke") | *(none)*                                                                                                                                                                                                                |
|                                       |                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |
| Base price                            | 5000 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid")                                                                                                                                                                                      |
| Weight                                | [25](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| Material                              | [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron")                                                                                                                                                                                               |

**Angelslayer** is an [artifact weapon](/wiki/Artifact_weapon "Artifact weapon") that appears in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack") and [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"). It is [unaligned](/wiki/Unaligned "Unaligned"), and its [base item](/wiki/Base_item "Base item") is a [trident](/wiki/Trident "Trident") made of [iron](/wiki/Iron "Iron").

## Generation

In addition to random generation, Angelslayer can appear as a sacrifice gift for characters of all alignments.

A [balrog](/wiki/Balrog "Balrog") has a 1⁄20 chance of generating with Angelslayer.

## Description

While wielded, Angelslayer confers automatic searching and [half spell damage](/wiki/Half_spell_damage "Half spell damage"), and [warns the wielder](/wiki/Warned_of_monster_type "Warned of monster type") of any [angelic beings](/wiki/Angelic_being "Angelic being"). Angelslayer deals +1d10 bonus damage to non-[fire resistant](/wiki/Fire_resistant "Fire resistant") monsters and +1d5 to fire resistant ones - [major demons](/wiki/Major_demon "Major demon") are completely immune. Additionally, Angelslayer has a 1⁄10 chance of instantly killing any angelic being it hits.

Angelslayer can be combined with either [The Eye of Vecna](/wiki/The_Eye_of_Vecna "The Eye of Vecna") or [The Hand of Vecna](/wiki/The_Hand_of_Vecna_\(EvilHack\) "The Hand of Vecna (EvilHack)") at a [forge](/wiki/Forge_\(dungeon_feature\) "Forge (dungeon feature)") to create [The Sword of Annihilation](/wiki/The_Sword_of_Annihilation "The Sword of Annihilation").

## Encyclopedia entry

An artifact trident that warns of Angels, confers automatic  
searching and half-spell damage, and does extra fire damage  
to targets that are susceptible. Rumor has is that demons,  
especially Balrogs, are fond of this weapon.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Angelslayer\&action=edit)*

Material iron

Angelslayer is an artifact weapon that appears in EvilHack and Hack'EM. It is unaligned, and its base item is a trident made of iron.

Generation

In addition to random generation, Angelslayer can appear as a sacrifice gift for characters of all alignments.

A balrog has a 1⁄20 chance of generating with Angelslayer.

Description

While wielded, Angelslayer confers automatic searching and half spell damage, and warns the wielder of any angelic beings. Angelslayer deals +1d10 bonus damage to non-fire resistant monsters and +1d5 to fire resistant ones - major demons are completely immune. Additionally, Angelslayer has a 1⁄10 chance of instantly killing any angelic being it hits.

Angelslayer can be combined with either The Eye of Vecna or The Hand of Vecna at a forge to create The Sword of Annihilation.

Encyclopedia entry

An artifact trident that warns of Angels, confers automatic
searching and half-spell damage, and does extra fire damage
to targets that are susceptible. Rumor has is that demons,
especially Balrogs, are fond of this weapon.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
